channel.title: Philosophy on Tech Shinobi
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on Tech Shinobi

item.title: AI CyberSecurity, ChatGPT and Post-humanism
item.description: This is the text for a lecture I’m going to give recently. Thanks for Daniela Baron’s guide which helped me tremendously for creating the slides with RevealJS. Hey everyone. Okay, first, I have to confess and apologize that I could not prepare this enough. Because I have to working on my dissertation, which also discusses about AI augmented APT attack such as using ChatGPT to create phishing email and ransomware code.
